committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia

official_title: To establish the St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission, and for other purposes.
short_title: St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission Act of 2007

summary.text: St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission Act of 2007 - Establishes the St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission to plan and execute programs and activities to commemorate the 450th anniversary of the founding of St. Augustine, Florida.

titles.title: St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission Act of 2007
To establish the St. Augustine 450th Commemoration Commission, and for other purposes.
